snippet: New Zealand is to decide whether to approve an underwater iron-ore operation that would most likely become the first seafloor commercial metals mine.

byline.original: By GYLES BECKFOR | REUTERS and SONALI PAUL | REUTERS

lead_paragraph: New Zealand is to decide whether to approve an underwater iron-ore operation that would most likely become the first seafloor commercial metals mine.

headline.print_headline: Miners Make a Push for the Pacific Seafloor
headline.main: Miners Make a Push for the Pacific Seafloor
